page.title: 17Crichton and Newlandrig.
page.content: There are two small villages in our patch Crichton and Newlandrig. Both are similar: small and very attractive with old stone built cottages most of which have been modernised. It would be peaceful and very pleasant in the summer.There are many beautiful country walks around Crichton castle and the valley of the Tyne Water.You would probably be very friendly with your neighbour.There wouldn't be any heavy traffic on the roads and you could keep pets safely. There are more and more problems in large cities nowadays. Crime is on the increase and employment is a problem. In the country you could grow your own vegetables and be more independent.
